code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import'./rules.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Menu=_ref=>{let{columns,rows,handleSubmit,handleChange,setLevel,onLevelSelect}=_ref;const handleLevelClick=level=>{let levelColumns,levelRows;switch(level){case 1:levelColumns=8;levelRows=8;break;case 2:levelColumns=16;levelRows=16;break;case 3:levelColumns=32;levelRows=32;break;default:levelColumns=10;levelRows=10;}setLevel(levelColumns,levelRows);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"menu",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Choose a level"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"level-buttons",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"level-button",onClick:()=>handleLevelClick(1),children:"Level 1 (8x8)"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"level-button",onClick:()=>handleLevelClick(2),children:"Level 2 (16x16)"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"level-button",onClick:()=>handleLevelClick(3),children:"Level 3 (32x32)"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/Maze-game",className:"back-button",children:"Back to Title Screen"})]});};export default Menu;
